UpgradeModulelink

一个 NgModule，你导入它以提供 AngularJS 核心服务，并有一个用于引导混合升级应用程序的实例方法。

An NgModule, which you import to provide AngularJS core services, and has an instance method used to bootstrap the hybrid upgrade application.

查看"说明"...

class UpgradeModule { $injector: any injector: Injector ngZone: NgZone bootstrap(element: Element, modules: string[] = [], config?: any): any }

说明link

支持 AOT 编译的混合升级应用程序的upgrade/静态库的一部分

Part of the upgrade/static library for hybrid upgrade apps that support AOT compilation

upgrade/static 包包含帮助器，允许在支持 AOT 编译的混合升级应用程序中一起使用 AngularJS 和 Angular 组件。

The upgrade/static package contains helpers that allow AngularJS and Angular components to be used together inside a hybrid upgrade application, which supports AOT compilation.

具体来说，upgrade/static 模块中的类和函数允许以下内容：

Specifically, the classes and functions in the upgrade/static module allow the following:

  1. 创建一个包装并公开 AngularJS 组件的 Angular 指令，以便可以在 Angular 模板中使用它。请参阅 UpgradeComponent。

    Creation of an Angular directive that wraps and exposes an AngularJS component so that it can be used in an Angular template. See UpgradeComponent.

  2. 创建一个包装并公开 Angular 组件的 AngularJS 指令，以便它可以在 AngularJS 模板中使用。请参阅 downgradeComponent。

    Creation of an AngularJS directive that wraps and exposes an Angular component so that it can be used in an AngularJS template. See downgradeComponent.

  3. 创建一个包装并公开 AngularJS 服务的 Angular 根注入器提供程序，以便可以将其注入 Angular 上下文。请参阅下面的升级 AngularJS 服务。

    Creation of an Angular root injector provider that wraps and exposes an AngularJS service so that it can be injected into an Angular context. See Upgrading an AngularJS service below.

  4. 创建一个包装并公开 Angular 可注入物的 AngularJS 服务，以便可以将其注入 AngularJS 上下文。请参阅 downgradeInjectable。

    Creation of an AngularJS service that wraps and exposes an Angular injectable so that it can be injected into an AngularJS context. See downgradeInjectable.

  5. 混合 Angular 应用程序的引导，该应用程序包含在单个应用程序中共存的两个框架。

    Bootstrapping of a hybrid Angular application which contains both of the frameworks coexisting in a single application.

Further information is available in the Usage Notes...

心理模型link

Mental Modellink

在推理混合应用程序的工作方式时，有一个心智模型会很有用，它可以描述正在发生的事情并在最低级别解释正在发生的事情。

When reasoning about how a hybrid application works it is useful to have a mental model which describes what is happening and explains what is happening at the lowest level.

  1. 在单个应用程序中运行有两个独立的框架，每个框架都将另一个框架视为黑盒。

    There are two independent frameworks running in a single application, each framework treats the other as a black box.

  2. 页面上的每个 DOM 元素都归一个框架所有。无论哪个框架实例化此元素，都是所有者。每个框架都只更新自己的 DOM 元素/交互，而忽略其他框架。

    Each DOM element on the page is owned exactly by one framework. Whichever framework instantiated the element is the owner. Each framework only updates/interacts with its own DOM elements and ignores others.

  3. AngularJS 指令始终在 AngularJS 框架代码库中执行，无论它们在何处实例化。

    AngularJS directives always execute inside the AngularJS framework codebase regardless of where they are instantiated.

  4. Angular 组件始终在 Angular 框架代码库中执行，无论它们在何处实例化。

    Angular components always execute inside the Angular framework codebase regardless of where they are instantiated.

  5. AngularJS 组件可以“升级”为 Angular 组件。这是通过定义 Angular 指令来实现的，该指令在 DOM 中的位置引导 AngularJS 组件。请参阅 UpgradeComponent。

    An AngularJS component can be "upgraded"" to an Angular component. This is achieved by defining an Angular directive, which bootstraps the AngularJS component at its location in the DOM. See UpgradeComponent.

  6. Angular 组件可以“降级”为 AngularJS 组件。这是通过定义一个 AngularJS 指令来实现的，该指令在 DOM 中的位置引导 Angular 组件。请参阅 downgradeComponent。

    An Angular component can be "downgraded" to an AngularJS component. This is achieved by defining an AngularJS directive, which bootstraps the Angular component at its location in the DOM. See downgradeComponent.

  7. 每当实例化“升级”/“降级”组件时，宿主元素就由进行实例化的框架拥有。然后另一个框架实例化并拥有该组件的视图。

    Whenever an "upgraded"/"downgraded" component is instantiated the host element is owned by the framework doing the instantiation. The other framework then instantiates and owns the view for that component.

    1. 这意味着组件绑定将始终遵循实例化框架的语义。

      This implies that the component bindings will always follow the semantics of the instantiation framework.

    2. DOM 属性由拥有当前模板的框架解析。所以 AngularJS 模板中的属性必须使用 kebab-case，而 AngularJS 模板必须使用 camelCase。

      The DOM attributes are parsed by the framework that owns the current template. So attributes in AngularJS templates must use kebab-case, while AngularJS templates must use camelCase.

    3. 然而，模板绑定语法将始终使用 Angular 样式，例如用于属性绑定的方括号 ( [...] )。

      However the template binding syntax will always use the Angular style, e.g. square brackets ([...]) for property binding.

  8. Angular 首先被引导； AngularJS 是第二个引导程序。AngularJS 始终拥有应用程序的根组件。

    Angular is bootstrapped first; AngularJS is bootstrapped second. AngularJS always owns the root component of the application.

  9. 新应用程序在 Angular 区域中运行，因此它不再需要调用 $apply()。

    The new application is running in an Angular zone, and therefore it no longer needs calls to $apply().

UpgradeModule 模块类link

The UpgradeModule classlink

这个类是一个 NgModule，你导入它来提供 AngularJS 核心服务，并且有一个用于引导混合升级应用程序的实例方法。

This class is an NgModule, which you import to provide AngularJS core services, and has an instance method used to bootstrap the hybrid upgrade application.

  • 核心 AngularJS 服务

    Core AngularJS services
    Importing this NgModule will add providers for the core AngularJS services to the root injector.

  • 引导程序

    Bootstrap
    The runtime instance of this class contains a `bootstrap()` method, which you use to bootstrap the top level AngularJS module onto an element in the DOM for the hybrid upgrade app.

    它还包含访问 root injector、bootstrap NgZone 和AngularJS $injector的属性。

    It also contains properties to access the root injector, the bootstrap NgZone and the AngularJS $injector.

例子link

Exampleslink

将 UpgradeModule 导入你的顶层 Angular `NgModule`。

Import the UpgradeModule into your top level Angular `NgModule`.

// This NgModule represents the Angular pieces of the application @NgModule({ declarations: [Ng2HeroesComponent, Ng1HeroComponentWrapper], providers: [ HeroesService, // Register an Angular provider whose value is the "upgraded" AngularJS service {provide: TextFormatter, useFactory: (i: any) => i.get('textFormatter'), deps: ['$injector']} ], // We must import `UpgradeModule` to get access to the AngularJS core services imports: [BrowserModule, UpgradeModule] }) export class Ng2AppModule { }

然后将 UpgradeModule 注入 Angular NgModule 并使用它在 ngDoBootstrap() 方法中引导顶级AngularJS 模块。

Then inject UpgradeModule into your Angular NgModule and use it to bootstrap the top level AngularJS module in the ngDoBootstrap() method.

export class Ng2AppModule { constructor(private upgrade: UpgradeModule) {} ngDoBootstrap() { // We bootstrap the AngularJS app. this.upgrade.bootstrap(document.body, [ng1AppModule.name]); } }

最后，通过引导你的顶级 Angular NgModule 来启动整个过程。

Finally, kick off the whole process, by bootstrapping your top level Angular NgModule.

// We bootstrap the Angular module as we would do in a normal Angular app. // (We are using the dynamic browser platform as this example has not been compiled AOT.) platformBrowserDynamic().bootstrapModule(Ng2AppModule);

升级 AngularJS 服务link

Upgrading an AngularJS servicelink

没有用于升级 AngularJS 服务的特定 API。相反，你应该遵循以下食谱：

There is no specific API for upgrading an AngularJS service. Instead you should just follow the following recipe:

假设你有一个 AngularJS 服务：

Let's say you have an AngularJS service:

export class TextFormatter { titleCase(value: string) { return value.replace(/((^|\s)[a-z])/g, (_, c) => c.toUpperCase()); } } // This AngularJS service will be "upgraded" to be used in Angular ng1AppModule.service('textFormatter', [TextFormatter]);

然后你应该定义一个 Angular provider 来包含在你的 NgModule providers 属性中。

Then you should define an Angular provider to be included in your NgModule providers property.

// Register an Angular provider whose value is the "upgraded" AngularJS service {provide: TextFormatter, useFactory: (i: any) => i.get('textFormatter'), deps: ['$injector']}

然后，你可以通过将“升级后的”AngularJS 服务注入到 Angular 组件或服务中来使用它。

Then you can use the "upgraded" AngularJS service by injecting it into an Angular component or service.

constructor(textFormatter: TextFormatter) { // Change all the hero names to title case, using the "upgraded" AngularJS service this.heroes.forEach((hero: Hero) => hero.name = textFormatter.titleCase(hero.name)); }
